abilities.name: Dark and Clear
abilities.effect: As long as Rocket's Suicune ex has any Darkness Energy attached to it, Rocket's Suicune ex can't be affected by any Special Conditions."

attacks.name: Icy Wind
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Hyper Splash
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon is a Stage 2 Evolved Pokémon, this attack does 50 damage plus 40 more damage.
